required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Larsen & Toubro (L&T) Noninvasive Blood Pressure Module Performance Validation
clinical_study.official_title: L&T Noninvasive Blood Pressure Module Performance Validation

brief_summary.textblock: To validate accuracy of the readings of noninvasive blood pressure (NIBP) module with sphygmomanometer as per the requirements of AAMI SP10:2002. This study is for adult and pediatric population.

study_pop.textblock: Total 92 numbers of subjects or patients were studied during this study.

criteria.textblock:
Subjects: Healthy volunteers
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subjects
- Age between 1 - 60 yrs
- Both genders
- Consenting for the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects suffering from cardiorespiratory, neurological or endocrinal disorders
- Subjects with alcohol abuse/dependance
- Female subjects who are pregnant or lactating
- Subjects with pace maker implantations
Subjects: Diseased subjects
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients of hypertensive, ICU and in patients of different diseases
- Age between 1 - 80 yrs
- Both genders
- Consenting for the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers
